title: Header
description: The basis for a JACS document

jacsVersion.description: Version id of the object. uuid v4 string

jacsSignature.description: Signature of of every field except this one and the hashing field by the creating/editing agent.

jacsRegistration.description: Signature by a sigining authority like https://hai.ai.

jacsAgreement.description: Signatures signifying an agreement between agents.

jacsAgreementHash.description: A hash that must not change for each signature.

jacsPreviousVersion.description: Previous Version id of the object. If blank, it's claiming to be the first

jacsOriginalVersion.description: Original Version id of the object.

jacsOriginalDate.description: Original creation date of the document.

jacsSha256.description: Hash of every field except this one. During  updates and creation hash is the last thing to occur, as it includes the signature. Not immediatly required, but eventually required.

jacsFiles.description: A set of files included with the jacs document
